courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and modern frameworks to become a full-stack web developer.

courses.title: Data Science
courses.description: Master data analysis, Python, statistics, and visualization to solve real-world problems.

courses.title: Machine Learning
courses.description: Understand machine learning algorithms, model training, and AI concepts using Python.

courses.title: Mobile Development
courses.description: Build Android and iOS apps using React Native and modern mobile development tools.

courses.title: Backend Development
courses.description: Learn backend basics including servers, APIs, databases, authentication, and REST architecture.

courses.title: DevOps & Cloud Computing
courses.description: Learn CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, cloud services, and deployment best practices.

courses.title: Cyber Security
courses.description: Understand ethical hacking, network security, vulnerabilities, and cyber defense techniques.

courses.title: UI/UX Design
courses.description: Learn user experience design, wireframing, prototyping, and modern UI design principles.
